definition: after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]

sentences.english: Finding should change standard of care, which is 4 doses every 3 weeks, researchers say.
sentences.chinese: 研究员说该发现将改变每3周4次给药的治疗标准。

sentences.english: Are you aware that many researchers are convinced that prolonged close work causes myopia?
sentences.chinese: 你认为，许多研究员确信长期近距离工作引起近视吗？

sentences.english: Xiaobing Sun, male, born in 1966, Ph. D, associate professor.
sentences.chinese: 孙晓兵，男，1966年生，博士，副研究员。

sentences.english: By manipulating the energy states, they were able to control the current passing through the molecule.
sentences.chinese: 采用这一方法，研究员可以控制穿越分子的电流。

sentences.english: He is now a researcher at Instiute For Arts & Literature Trend of People's University of China.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国人民大学文艺思潮研究所研究员。

sentences.english: A researcher named Dr. Charles Czeisler, tells about an interesting experiment.
sentences.chinese: 一个叫C博士的研究员做了一个有趣的实验。

sentences.english: Xian-Chun Zhang. Pteridologist, Research professor at the Institute of Botany, Chinese Academy of Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 张宪春，中国科学院植物研究所研究员，博士生导师。

sentences.english: A good example a university job like a teaching or research asistanshipresearch assistantship.
sentences.chinese: 在大学任助教或助理研究员就是个不错的例子。

sentences.english: Barry E. DiGregorio is a research associate for the Cardiff Center for Astrobiology in Wales, U. K.
sentences.chinese: 英国威尔斯卡地夫天文生物学中心的副研究员。

sentences.english: The researchers said there are close ties between duck grazing patterns and rice cropping intensity.
sentences.chinese: 研究员指出，放养鸭子和水稻栽种密度也有密切关联。

sentences.english: I also think it makes Aunts "Associate Research Assistants ".
sentences.chinese: 偶想，小姨子也因此成了“研究员助理”。

sentences.english: Headquarters Economy was first used by the researcher named Zhao Hong from Beijing Academy of Social Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 总部经济最早是由北京社科院的赵弘研究员命名的。

sentences.english: Hong Hyun-ik is a North Korea researcher at the Sejong Institute in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 韩信一是首尔世宗研究所的北韩问题研究员。

sentences.english: Comrade Huang Xiaohui is researcher of institute of technology of economy of state committee of planning.
sentences.chinese: 黄小蕙同志是国家计委经济技术研究所研究员。

sentences.english: I aspired to become a leading researcher at Umbrella Inc.
sentences.chinese: 我原本渴望成为安布雷拉公司的主要研究员。

sentences.english: Researchers believe that some hummingbirds fly non-stop over the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 研究员相信，一些蜂鸟会马不停蹄地飞越墨西哥湾。

definition: deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 She4 hui4 Ke1 xue2 yuan4

definition: the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
